item.title: The Butchers Club Burger offers National Day dishes in celebration of Singapore's 51st anniversary
item.description: The Butchers Club Burger in Singapore is launching a special menu item for National Day: The Little Red Dot Burger. Starting July 29th and lasting for two weekends, The Little Red Dot Burger will be featured as part of a National Day Set Menu at The Butchers Club Burger Singapore. This marks the restaurant’s first National Day celebration in Singapore, and the burger itself is a tribute to a beloved local dish: satay ayam (chicken satay).

item.title: Starbucks in Asia is offering merchandise for Chinese New Year
item.description: To commemorate the 2016 Lunar Year of the Monkey, Starbucks has introduced a special collection of limited-edition items available in Asian markets. This merchandise includes: [Image of Starbucks Monkey Mug] Lunar New Year Monkey Mug This red ceramic mug features a three-dimensional white monkey. Its body wraps around the side, its tail forms the handle, and its playful expression peeks out from the mug’s surface. The design is enhanced with a glossy red glaze, a contrasting yellow interior, and gold-colored vines.

item.title: SilkAir will provide direct charter flights to Okinawa
item.description: To encourage travel between Singapore and Okinawa, SilkAir, the Okinawa Prefecture government, Japan, and Changi Airport Group are collaborating on seven direct SilkAir charter flights. These flights will operate between June 1st and 25th, 2016, connecting Singapore and Okinawa, Japan’s southernmost prefecture. Travelers can book these full-service flights through Singapore travel agents. SilkAir’s Boeing 737-800 aircraft, featuring Business and Economy class cabins, will service the route. Passengers will enjoy a comprehensive range of full-service offerings, including a baggage allowance of 30kg for Economy and 40kg for Business class, inflight meals, and complimentary inflight entertainment through SilkAir Studio.

item.title: HP introduces a limited edition notebook featuring a Star Wars theme
item.description: In anticipation of the release of Star Wars: “The Force Awakens,” HP has launched a special edition notebook. “As the only PC vendor collaborating with Disney and Lucasfilm, HP is providing an incredible Star Wars experience by creating a truly unique notebook," shared Serena Yong, Managing Director of HP Singapore. “This collaboration granted us access to Lucasfilm’s media archives, which we used to create customizable screen savers, desktop backgrounds, and sound profiles.
